result.execSummary:
The defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:

*Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs, fees and surcharges (including DNA) by January 30, 2017 , or to be docketed as a civil judgment.
*Court ordered restitution set at $0 (zero).
Consecutive to: To any other sentence, with credit for 0 (zero) days time served. The Court granted Huber privileges, pursuant to 303.08 Wis. Stats. for work (if employed) ONLY.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Reggno Jermaine Robinson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  

AS TO COUNT 1:

The Court ordered defendant to serve 45 days in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence, with credit for 0 (zero) days time served. The Court granted Huber privileges, pursuant to 303.08 Wis. Stats. for work (if employed) ONLY:

Court ordered DNA sample after today's proceedings.  

Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs, fees and surcharges (including DNA) by January 30, 2017 , or to be docketed as a civil judgment.

Court ordered restitution set at $0 (zero).
.
20 day appeal given,

Filed;
-Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief;
-Victim Impact Statement.

Defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson in court with attorney Brian Christopher Hagner.  Defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson in custody.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

AS TO COUNT 1:

Defendant changes plea to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty. Court found that defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights. Plea questionnaire received and filed. Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant guilty as charged in the criminal complaint  and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record. Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.
Plea/Sentencing Hearing on Thursday, January 28, 2016 at 8:30 AM in BR 31, CH Rm 615 of the Circuit Court of Milwaukee County.

Attorney Brian Christopher Hagner in court, defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson not in court, in custody.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for pre-trial conference. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 31. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 28, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Christian Thomas Eichenlaub in court, defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson not in court, in custody.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status of counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 31. All parties are notified that effective 12-1-15 this case will be assigned to Reserve Branch, Branch 31, in Room 615 of the Courthouse. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  
  Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson in custody.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing.   Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant.  Case adjourned for status of counsel in branch 37.  Status conference scheduled for November 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson not in court, in custody at Jackson Correctional.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. COURT IS DOWN for today's proceedings. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered all previous conditions to remain in effect.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson not in court, in custody at Jackson Correctional and not produced.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   ENTRY MADE WITHOUT COURT FILE.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. For reasons stated on the record, Court ordered previously issued bench warrant cancelled.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 26, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Cash bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 100.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court prior to case being called.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing hearing. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson not in court, in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Due to lateness of the hour, Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 25, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson not in court, in custody and not produced.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Defendant has a revocation hearing on July 7, 2015.   Court ordered case adjourned for speedy projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson not in court, in custody.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel has received discovery and offer. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Kohl's at 5650 N Bayshore Drive, Glendale, WI, 53217

Defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.  Defendant Reggno Jermaine Robinson in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Defense moves to dismiss for lack of particularity.  Arguments heard.  State moves to amend.  Court DENIES motion to dismiss and orders the last sentence of the criminal complaint amended to read:  The total amount of the merchandis taken was $364.91, which was done without the consent of said merchant.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 30, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
